title: Kimera
synopsis: Osamu and Jay are two cereal salesmen traveling for work when they encounter a barricade. Curious as to what is going on, they step out of their car and enter into a government secret. Two mysterious demon-like men have been terrorizing the military, who came to respond to a car crash involving a vehicle carrying government research material. Inside the car wreckage, Osamu finds a beautiful hermaphrodite with gold and crimson eyes trapped in a frozen chamber. Osamu shares a kiss with them through the glass before he is forced to flee the scene.
staff: [['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Umetsu, Yasuomi', ['Character Design']], ['Kodaka, Kazuma', ['Original Creator']], ['Campbell, Charles', ['Recording Engineer']]]
